scripts.build: npm run build.core && npm run build.ui && (npm run build.demo.confapp & npm run build.demo.todomvc)
scripts.build.quick: (cd ionic-core && npm run build.quick) && (cd demos/todomvc && npm run build.quick)
scripts.validate: (cd ionic-core && npm run validate) && (cd ionic-ui && npm run validate) && (cd demos/confapp && npm run validate)
scripts.todomvc: npm run start.core && npm run start.demo.todomvc && cd demos/todomvc && npm run minify && npm run serve
scripts.confapp: npm run start.core && npm run start.ui && npm run start.demo.confapp && cd demos/confapp && npm run stats && npm run serve
